# Anson Stephan - Front End Developer & Agency Founder

## Bio
I am a developer passionate about crafting accessible, pixel-perfect user interfaces that blend thoughtful design with robust engineering. I am the co-founder of A* Codex (formerly ScaleBridge), a digital agency helping brands scale their presence.

## Expertise
- **Core:** React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, TypeScript
- **Stack:** MERN (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js)
- **Focus:** Accessibility, Performance, SEO, UI/UX Design

## Experience
- **Co-Founder & Lead Developer @ A* Codex (2025 - Present)**
  Leading a digital agency focused on web development and SEO. Expanding into custom software solutions.
  [Website](https://astarcodex.com)

## Key Projects
1. **ScaleBridge Agency:** High-performance agency site. 95+ PageSpeed score.
2. **AI Chat Support:** GPT-powered customer service assistant for e-commerce.
3. **Aromatte Luxe:** Full-stack luxury perfume e-commerce platform.
